head.title: Seating Plan Generator
head.description: Create and manage seating plans easily with our intuitive tool.

homePage.header: A {0} seating plan is part of your success
homePage.subHeader: An organized seating plan encourages engagement and interaction among students

planDialog.sortingCriteriaTooltip: You can add a criterion to help you sort the data — for example, a teacher might use students’ marks as a sorting criterion.
planDialog.addNamesDescription: Here, you can create a list of attendees. Type each name on a separate line, then click 'Add Data' when you’re finished
planDialog.namesListLabel: Enter each name on a new line
planDialog.valuesListLabel: Enter each value on a new line

names.notEnough: To proceed, you need to add at least 10 names
names.tooLong: Long names will be cut to 30 characters

criteria.emptyRows: Empty rows will be converted to 0
criteria.nonNumeric: Non-numeric values will be converted to 0
